@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00247 for Sampling Event EMOBON_OSD74_Wa_14
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: Interdisciplinary Centre of Marine and Environmental Research
Sampling country: Portugal
Sampling station lat/long: 41.146528:-8.666639
Sampling environment: water_column
Sampling station contact name: Catarina Magalhães
Sampling station contact ORCID id: 0000-0001-9576-2398
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51659

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00247
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_OSD74_Wa_14

MetaGOflow run id: HVWGWDSX5.UDI104
